name: Horizontal Space Invaders
description:
This game wont have any updates but just have fun! 

Controls: WASD or ARROW KEYS TO MOVE

SPACE or Q to shoot

Mobile Controls: On the left is a joystick to move the ship and A is to shoot

If the game has any glitches or doesn't work tell me!

MakeCode Arcade is on chromebooks for free and maybe can download it on mobile! 

Once the game is downloaded you can edit my own game to make the game you want it to simulate! You have many options to simulate but I recommend to do a tutorial first!

Don't worry if the enemy ship is close or hits your ship IF you shot if first because it won't do any damage.
